com.apigee.flow.execution

Enum Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Action>
      • com.apigee.flow.execution.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Action>

    public enum Action
extends java.lang.Enum<Action>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    The Action class provides constants that are required for constructing an ExecutionResult object. See the example below, which shows how to use ExecutionResult to set custom error response content and headers.

    Example: Use an Action constant to construct an ExecutionResult object

    public class JavaError implements Execution {

    public ExecutionResult execute(MessageContext messageContext, ExecutionContext executionContext) {

        try {

            // Code that may throw an error. 

            return ExecutionResult.SUCCESS;

        } catch (RuntimeException ex) {

            ExecutionResult executionResult = new ExecutionResult(false, Action.ABORT);

            //--Returns custom error message and header
            executionResult.setErrorResponse(ex.getMessage());
            executionResult.addErrorResponseHeader("ExceptionClass", ex.getClass().getName());

            return executionResult;
        }
    }
}
    Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    ABORT 
    CONTINUE 
    PAUSE
